arStrings.szText: Consuming a Corpse {c_important}{u}Fortifies{/u}{/c} you for {c_number}[SF_0 * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([{SF_3} * PlayerHealthMax()]){/c} and grants {c_number}[SF_0 * 100|%|]{/c} Damage Reduction for {c_number}[SF_5]{/c} seconds.
Taking reduced damage after consuming a Corpse.
